Class nsi.registry.client.java.rrp.api.RRPSession 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----nsi.registry.client.java.rrp.api.RRPSession
public class RRPSession
extends Object
RRPSession provides a simple interface for connecting and issuing, commands to, and receiving RRP responses from an RRP server.

RRPSession(String, int)
Creates an unauthenticated RRP session by connecting to the specified RRP Server process.
RRPSession(String, int, long)
Creates an unauthenticated RRP session by connecting to the specified RRP Server process.

addDomain(String, Vector)
Enables a registrar to register a domain name
addDomain(String, Vector, int)
Enables a registrar to register a domain name with an explicit registration period for RRP Version 1.1
addNameServer(String, Vector)
Enables a registrar to register a name server
checkDomain(String)
Enables a registrar to check the availability of a domain name
checkNameServer(String)
Enables a registrar to check the availability of a name server
deleteDomain(String)
Enables a registrar to delete the registration of a domain name
deleteNameServer(String)
Enables a registrar to delete the registration of a name server
describe(String)
Enables a registrar to get general information about RRP
endSession()
Enables a registrar to close an RRP connection
modifyDomain(String, Vector, Properties, Vector, Vector, Properties, Vector)
Enables a registrar to update a registered domain name
modifyNameServer(String, String, Vector, Properties, Vector)
Enables a registrar to update a registered name server
renewDomain(String)
Enables a registrar to renew the registration of a domain name
renewDomain(String, int, int)
Enables a registrar to renew the registration of a domain name
startSession(String, String, String)
This method enables a registrar to authenticate an RRP connection.
statusDomain(String)
Enables a registrar to query a domain name.
statusNameServer(String)
Enables a registrar to query a name server.
transferDomain(String)
Enables a registrar to transfer a domain name from another registrar to itself
transferDomain(String, boolean)
Enables a registrar to approve or deny the transfer of a domain from itself to another registrar

RRPSession 
 public RRPSession(String host,
                   int port) throws RRPException
Creates an unauthenticated RRP session by connecting to the specified RRP Server process.

Parameters:
host - hostname of RRP server with which to connect
port - RRP server port to connect to
Throws: RRPException
if host is null or empty, if port less than zero or if any internal errors occur
RRPSession 
 public RRPSession(String host,
                   int port,
                   long aTimeout) throws RRPException
Creates an unauthenticated RRP session by connecting to the specified RRP Server process.

Parameters:
host - hostname of RRP server with which to connect
port - RRP server port to connect to
aTimeout - a timeout value (in seconds) for socket operations. A value of 0 disable timeout timer
Throws: RRPException
if host is null or empty, if port less than zero or if any internal errors occur

startSession 
 public Response startSession(String id,
                              String password,
                              String newPassword) throws RRPException
This method enables a registrar to authenticate an RRP connection. This method must be called successfully prior to issuing any other RRP requests.

Parameters:
id - ID of the registrar
password - Password of the registrar
newPassword - An optional new password to set for the registrar. A null value can be passed if parameter is not applicable.
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if id or password is null or if any internal errors occur
addDomain 
 public Response addDomain(String domainName,
                           Vector nameServers) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to register a domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to register
nameServers - An optional vector containing the fully qualified host names of the registered name servers that will be hosting domainName
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null, or if any internal errors occur
addDomain 
 public Response addDomain(String domainName,
                           Vector nameServers,
                           int registrationPeriod) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to register a domain name with an explicit registration period for RRP Version 1.1

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to register
nameServers - An optional vector containing the fully qualified host names of the registered name servers that will be hosting domainName
registrationPeriod - A new option for version 1.1, stands for the registration period of the domain to be added.
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null, or if any internal errors occur
addNameServer 
 public Response addNameServer(String nameServer,
                               Vector ipAddresses) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to register a name server

Parameters:
nameServer - A fully qualified host name of a name server
ipAddresses - An vector containing one or more IP addresses of the name server
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if nameServer or ipAddresses is null, or if any internal errors occur

 public Response checkDomain(String domainName) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to check the availability of a domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to check
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
checkNameServer 
 public Response checkNameServer(String nameServer) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to check the availability of a name server

Parameters:
nameServer - The hostname of the name server to check
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if nameServer is null or if any internal errors occur

 public Response deleteDomain(String domainName) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to delete the registration of a domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to delete
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
deleteNameServer 
 public Response deleteNameServer(String nameServer) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to delete the registration of a name server

Parameters:
nameServer - Fully qualified host name of name server to delete
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
If nameServer is null or if any internal errors occur
describe 
 public Response describe(String target) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to get general information about RRP

Parameters:
target - Optional string indiciating the type of information desired. The default value if target is null is "Protocol"
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
If any internal errors occur
modifyDomain 
 public Response modifyDomain(String domainName,
                              Vector addedNameServers,
                              Properties modifiedNameServers,
                              Vector deletedNameServers,
                              Vector addedStatuses,
                              Properties modifiedStatuses,
                              Vector deletedStatuses) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to update a registered domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to update
addedNameServers - A Vector of registered name servers to add to the domain
modifiedNameServers - A Properties object containing the domain's name servers to replace. The key is the old name server and the value is the new
deletedNameServers - A Vector of registered name servers to delete from the domain
addedStatuses - A Vector of statuses to add to the domain
modifiedStatuses - A Properties object containing the domain's statuses to replace. The key is the old status and the value is the new
deletedStatuses - A Vector of statuses to delete from the domain
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
modifyNameServer 
 public Response modifyNameServer(String nameServer,
                                  String newNameServer,
                                  Vector addedIPAddresses,
                                  Properties modifiedIPAddresses,
                                  Vector deletedIPAddresses) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to update a registered name server

Parameters:
nameServer - A fully qualified host name of a registered name server to update
addedIPAddresses - A Vector of IP addresses to add to the name server
modifiedIPAddresses - A Properties object containing the name servers's IP addresses with which to replace. Each key is an old IP address and the value is the new IP Address
deletedIPAddresses - A Vector of IP addresses to delete from the name server
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if nameServer is null or if any internal errors occur
renewDomain 
 public Response renewDomain(String domainName) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to renew the registration of a domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to renew
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
renewDomain 
 public Response renewDomain(String domainName,
                             int renewRegistrationPeriod,
                             int currentExpirationYear) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to renew the registration of a domain name

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to renew
renewRegistrationPeriod - The renew registration period of the domain
currentExpirationYear - The current expiration year. If accepted, the domain will be renewed starting from this year.
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
statusDomain 
 public Response statusDomain(String domainName) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to query a domain name. The following attributes will be included in a successful Response:
  • Domain name
  • Name servers
  • Registration expiration date
  • ID of the current registrar
  • Date the domain name was transferred by the current registrar
  • Current status of the domain
  • Date the domain name was registered
  • ID of the registrar that registered the domain name
  • Date the domain name was last updated
  • ID of the entity that last updated the domain

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to query
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
statusNameServer 
 public Response statusNameServer(String nameServer) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to query a name server. The following attributes will be included in a successful Response:
  • Fully qualified host name of name server
  • IP addresses of the name server
  • ID of the current registrar
  • Date the name server was transferred by the current registrar
  • Date the name server was registered
  • ID of the entity that registered the name server
  • Date the name server was last updated
  • ID of the entity that that last updated the name server

Parameters:
nameServer - Fully qualified host name of name server to query.
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
If nameServer is null or if any internal errors occur
transferDomain 
 public Response transferDomain(String domainName) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to transfer a domain name from another registrar to itself

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to transfer
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
transferDomain 
 public Response transferDomain(String domainName,
                                boolean approve) throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to approve or deny the transfer of a domain from itself to another registrar

Parameters:
domainName - A fully qualified domain name to transfer
approve - true to approve the transfer, false to deny it.
Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if domainName is null or if any internal errors occur
endSession 
 public Response endSession() throws RRPException
Enables a registrar to close an RRP connection

Returns:
a Response object containing the response code, description and attributes - if applicable - returned from the RRP request
Throws: RRPException
if any internal errors occur
